DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Performed Observation Outcome Original Collection Unit of Measure Flag ISO21090.BL.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Specifies whether the observation is represented in the units or values as originally collected. EXAMPLE(S): A performing lab may have completed the observation or lab test using conventional units, but the sponsor may wish to have the test reported in SI units. This flag will be set to Y on the lab test that has the original units, and N on the lab test in which the units that are different than the lab test's original units.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Performed Observation Outcome Original Collection Unit of Measure Flag
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._Preceding all others in time or being as first made or performed.:The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredName: Original Collection Unit of Measure Flag
Property.preferredDefinition: Preceding all others in time or being as first made or performed.:The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.:A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: Preceding all others in time or being as first made or performed.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.
A named quantity in terms of which other quantities are measured or specified, used as a standard measurement of like kinds.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
